title: Man on Crystal Meth Kills 12 Neighbors, Thinking They’re Zombies?
subtitle: Reports of a Georgia man high on meth who went on a killing frenzy after binge-watching too many 'Walking Dead' episodes are fake news.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A Georgia man went on a killing frenzy and murdered 31 people after binge-watching  The Walking Dead.
